page.title: 05Work pattern in Abbotsley
page.content:
(continued from page 4) We grow all our own hay and after harvest my dad bales the straw and stacks it.We have three stacks each year made of opproximately 6,000 bales each. We keep enough corn after havest to feed our own cattle all winter and the rest is sold to make bread or to be re-sold abroad perhaps some to aid famine relief.
Work Pattern In Abbotsley
Out of the working population 17 people travel less than 5 miles to work,7 less than 10 miles,9 less than 15 miles,6 less than 20 miles,18 more than 20 miles,9 work in the house or the back yard.Only 16 inhabitants are connected with agriculture. 66.6% of the married women go out to work.
